anya-e0105n30:1: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniṃ nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ pana ācariyo sumaṅgalapariveṇavāsinā dāṭhānāgattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:6: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:7: Papañcasūdaniṃ nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ bhadantabuddhamittattherena pubbe mayūradūtapaṭṭane attanā saddhiṃ vasantena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:12: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti ma. ni. aṭṭha. 3. nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:13: Sāratthappakāsiniṃ nāma saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ bhadantajotipālattherena āyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:17: Yaṃ samadhigataṃ puññaṃ, tenāpi jano sukhī bhavatū’’ti saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:18: Manorathapūraṇiṃ nāma aṅguttaranikāyaṭṭhakathaṃ bhadantajotipālattherena dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhe kañcipurādīsu ca sīhaḷadīpe mahāvihāramhi ca attanā saddhiṃ vasantena āyācito, tathā jīvakenāpi upāsakena piṭakattayapāragubhūtena vātāhatepi aniñjamānasabhāve dume viya aniñjamānasaddhamme ṭhitena sumatinā parisuddhājīvenābhiyācito akāsi. Vuttaṃ hetametissā nigamane –
anya-e0105n30:29: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā;
anya-e0105n30:31: Sabbāgamasaṃvaṇṇana, manoratho pūrito ca me yasmā;
anya-e0105n30:32: Etāya manoratha pūraṇīti nāmaṃ tato assā’’ti a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.11.nigamanakathā.
anya-e0105n30:33: Imā ca pana catasso āgamaṭṭhakathāyo kurumāno ācariyabuddhaghoso mahāmahindattherenābhataṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāsaṅkhātaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathaṃyeva bhāsāparivattanavasena ceva punappunāgatavitthārakathāmaggassa saṃkhipanavasena ca akāsi. Vuttañhetaṃ ganthārambhe –
anya-e0105n30:40: ‘‘Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya, sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca;
anya-e0105n30:41: ‘‘Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ, ādāya mayā imaṃ karontenā’’ti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 3.nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n30:42: Imāsaṃ sarīrabhūtapāṭhesu ca samantapāsādikāyaṃ viya ‘‘mahāpaccariyaṃ, kurundiya’’ntiādinā vinicchayasaṃvaṇṇanābhedappakāsanaṃ na dissati, tathā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāsupi. Tenetaṃ ñāyati ‘‘suttantābhidhammesu mahāaṭṭhakathāto aññā mahāpaccariādināmikā porāṇikā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ceva andhakaṭṭhakathā ca natthī’’ti. Yāva vasabharājakālā (609-653) pana pākaṭānaṃ sīhaḷikattherānaṃ vinicchayo ca vādā ca vatthūni ca etāsupi dissantiyevāti.
